issue.title: Clarify build requirements
issue.body:
Hi Tristan, really excited about this project. I tried building it (`cargo install --git https://github.com/trishume/quickdown.git`) and it failed with the following errors:

```
error[E0308]: mismatched types
   --> /home/wmoore/.cargo/git/checkouts/quickdown-6e9882b400693a9c/b1fad19/fasternet_client/src/style.rs:386:29
    |
386 |                 local_clip: Some(LocalClip::RoundedRect(rect, clip)),
    |                             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ expected enum `webrender::<unnamed>::LocalClip`, found enum `std::option::Option`
    |
    = note: expected type `webrender::<unnamed>::LocalClip`
               found type `std::option::Option<webrender::<unnamed>::LocalClip>`
    = help: here are some functions which might fulfill your needs:
            - .unwrap()

error[E0308]: mismatched types
   --> /home/wmoore/.cargo/git/checkouts/quickdown-6e9882b400693a9c/b1fad19/fasternet_client/src/style.rs:430:29
    |
430 |                 local_clip: Some(LocalClip::RoundedRect(rect, clip)),
    |                             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ expected enum `webrender::<unnamed>::LocalClip`, found enum `std::option::Option`
    |
    = note: expected type `webrender::<unnamed>::LocalClip`
               found type `std::option::Option<webrender::<unnamed>::LocalClip>`
    = help: here are some functions which might fulfill your needs:
            - .unwrap()

error: aborting due to 2 previous errors

error: failed to compile `fasternet_client v0.1.0 (https://github.com/trishume/quickdown.git#b1fad199)`, intermediate artifacts can be found at `/tmp/cargo-install.95tTkvKoYa5G`

Caused by:
  Could not compile `fasternet_client`.
```

I'm using rust 1.20 stable on Arch Linux. Does it need nightly? If so, do you have a suggested version? If not, any other pointers to get it building?
